original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, users as u WHERE p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-21 11:05:37' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-25 17:59:25' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-21 21:27:38' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-21 11:05:37' AND CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-25 17:59:25'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.Id=E3.RelatedPostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.UpVotes >= 0 AND users.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-21 21:27:38'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3.OwnerUserId=E4.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E3E4.Id)
